title: Resource
description: A resource is an external, versionable static resource that can be retrieved or created. It can be used as both and input and output for tasks.

example.description: An example value of an output for the resource.

object.title: Object
object.description: An object is a base object that all other objects inherit from.

id.description: The unique identifier for the object

orgId.description: The unique identifier for the organization the object belongs to.

credential.description: The name of the credential to use for this object.
